translations: n.校友，毕业生（alumnus 的复数）

sentences.sentence: Make your cheque payable to "Stanford Alumni Association."
sentences.translation: 把支票开给“斯坦福校友会”。

sentences.sentence: Five Year Alumni Reunion is coming.
sentences.translation: 五年校友聚会就要到了。

sentences.sentence: The department has many prominent alumni.
sentences.translation: 这个系出了许多杰出的校友。
